title: 24 Hours Using ONLY Android Pay
description: Learn more about Android Pay -  Guest appearance by Judner -  Guest appearance by MKBHD -   I spent 24 hours in New York using nothing but Android Pay. This is what happened...  This video was sponsored by Google #ad  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
